info.title: API Documentation
info.description: This is the API documentation for the Laravel application.

post.description: Creates a new user and returns the data
Authenticate user and return a JWT token
Creates a new Language and stores it in the database.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination

parameters.name: pet_type_id
parameters.description: ID of the Pet Breed to filter breeds

schema.description: Must be a valid ID from the pet_types table

post.description: Creates a new Pet Breed and stores it in the database.

created_at.description: Date and time of the creation
